short_summary: Invitation to Qualify - Gym Renovations of Building B8 at Dorchester Penitentiary
description: Electrical and mechanical upgrades, exterior cladding installation, asbestos removal, painting, and fencing
tags: building and facility maintenance and repair
full_summary:
**Title:** Invitation to Qualify - Gym Renovations at the Dorchester Penitentiary in Dorchester, New Brunswick

**Description:** The Department of Public Works and Government Services Canada (PSPC) invites qualified contractors to submit their expressions of interest for the gym renovations project at the Dorchester Penitentiary in Dorchester, New Brunswick. The project involves electrical and mechanical upgrades, exterior cladding and metal roofing installation, asbestos removal, and patch and paint work.

**Key Tender Details:**

* **Tender Reference Number:** WS4229847531-Doc4229865599
* **Tender Amendment Number:** 1
* **Publication Date:** September 27, 2023
* **Tender Closing Date:** October 17, 2023, 14:00:00 EST
* **Expected Contract Start Date:** November 17, 2023

**Contract Requirements:**

* The contractor shall perform the work within 64 weeks from the acceptance of the offer.
* The work shall be performed in accordance with the plans and specifications for PSPC Project Number R.061838.001.
* The contractor shall be responsible for asbestos removal in the main gym.

**Canada Trade Agreements:**

The tender is subject to the Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA).

**Regions of Opportunity:** New Brunswick

**Contact Information:**

* Name: Edward Johnston (SPAC/PSPC)
* Email: [edward.johnston@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca](mailto:edward.johnston@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca)
* Telephone: N/A
* Fax: N/A
* Website: [https://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/17567141?extsite=MTc1NjcxNDFfQU4wMTQ4NDA1MDk5Mg==](https://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/17567141?extsite=MTc1NjcxNDFfQU4wMTQ4NDA1MDk5Mg==)

**Summary:**
This tender invitation represents an opportunity for qualified contractors to submit their expressions of interest for the gym renovations project at the Dorchester Penitentiary in Dorchester, New Brunswick. The contractor shall be responsible for completing the renovations within the specified timeframe and in accordance with the project plans and specifications.
